# scheduledPickupTime

**Instance Property**

The time at which to pick up the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var scheduledPickupTime: INDateComponentsRange? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to schedule a vehicle to arrive at the specified time at the user’s location. Your handler for the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetRideStatusIntent] object should also pick the most appropriate ride for the scheduled time.

## Getting the Ride Details

- **rideOptionName**: The name of the ride option selected by the user.
- **partySize**: The number of passengers that the ride must accommodate.
- **pickupLocation**: The user’s starting location.
- **dropOffLocation**: The user’s destination.
